parameters.query:
SELECT 
  original_filename,
  relevancy_score,
  document_category,
  fraud_indicators,
  perjury_indicators,
  processed_at
FROM legal_documents 
WHERE relevancy_score >= 950 
  AND processed_at >= NOW() - INTERVAL '1 hour'
  AND docket_number = 'J24-00478'
ORDER BY relevancy_score DESC
LIMIT 10
